CustomField.formula: CASE(MOD( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE(1985,6,24),7), 0 , CASE( MOD( If(isnull(Sales_Cycle_End_Date__c),today(),Sales_Cycle_End_Date__c) - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ,7),1,1,2,2,3,3,4,4,5,4,6,4,0), 1 , CASE( MOD( If(isnull(Sales_Cycle_End_Date__c),today(),Sales_Cycle_End_Date__c) - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ,7),1,1,2,2,3,3,4,3,5,3,6,4,0), 2 , CASE( MOD( If(isnull(Sales_Cycle_End_Date__c),today(),Sales_Cycle_End_Date__c) - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ,7),1,1,2,2,3,2,4,2,5,3,6,4,0), 3 , CASE( MOD( If(isnull(Sales_Cycle_End_Date__c),today(),Sales_Cycle_End_Date__c) - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ,7),1,1,2,1,3,1,4,2,5,3,6,4,0), 4 , CASE( MOD( If(isnull(Sales_Cycle_End_Date__c),today(),Sales_Cycle_End_Date__c) - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ,7),1,0,2,0,3,1,4,2,5,3,6,4,0), 5 , CASE( MOD( If(isnull(Sales_Cycle_End_Date__c),today(),Sales_Cycle_End_Date__c) - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ,7),1,0,2,0,3,1,4,2,5,3,6,4,0), 6 , CASE( MOD( If(isnull(Sales_Cycle_End_Date__c),today(),Sales_Cycle_End_Date__c) - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ,7),1,0,2,1,3,2,4,3,5,4,6,4,0), 999) + (FLOOR(( If(isnull(Sales_Cycle_End_Date__c),today(),Sales_Cycle_End_Date__c) - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) )/7)*5)
CustomField.label: Age Excluding Weekends
